metadata.title: CVE-2016-3709 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Possible cross-site scripting vulnerability in libxml after commit 960f0e2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.14+dfsg-1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.14+dfsg-1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.14+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.14+dfsg-1').
